mapper.insert: insert into score (subjectCode, examName, uid, score) values (#{subjectCode}, #{examName}, #{uid}, #{score})
mapper.select: select qNumber, answer, qPoint from question where subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and examName=#{examName} order by qNumber
select subjectCode, examName, score from score as s join exam as e on s.examName = e.examName where e.subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and s.uid=#{uid} order by e.startTime
